snippet: Jim Kaat, who pitched in the major leagues for 25 years, is part of the MLB Network broadcast team for the playoffs. He reflects on his career and the changes in the game.
abstract: Jim Kaat, who pitched in the major leagues for 25 years, is part of the MLB Network broadcast team for the playoffs. He reflects on his career and the changes in the game.

headline.print_headline: An Arm That Wore Out but Never Rusted
